segments.content: Last week, the community gathered at the Next.js conference. This recap is a nice overview of the highlights, including:

segments.translated_content: 上周社区齐聚Next.js大会，这篇回顾精彩呈现了包括以下亮点：

segments.content:
* Next.js 15 stable
* Turbopack Dev stable
* Simpler caching, reduced complexity
* Self-hosting improvements and templates
segments.sourceMdx:
- Next.js 15 stable
- Turbopack Dev stable

- Self-hosting improvements and templates
segments.translated_content:
- Next.js 15稳定版发布
- Turbopack开发环境稳定
- 更简化的缓存机制
- 自托管优化与模板

segments.content: The sister blog post [Our Journey with Caching](https://nextjs.org/blog/our-journey-with-caching) is particularly interesting, introducing new experimental caching semantics and APIs such as `use cache`, `cacheTag`, and `cacheLife`. It’s a more flexible system, and super cool that you don’t even need to provide a cache key.

segments.translated_content: 姊妹篇博文[《我们的缓存演进之路》](https://nextjs.org/blog/our-journey-with-caching)尤为值得关注，介绍了实验性的新缓存语义和API如`use cache`、`cacheTag`和`cacheLife`。这套更灵活的系统最酷的是甚至无需提供缓存键。

segments.content: React Native 0.76 is out with major updates! The New Architecture is now enabled by default, there's a new React Native DevTools for improved debugging, and CSS support for `boxShadow` and `filter` for enhanced UI effects (available only with the new architecture). Be aware of some breaking changes: minimum SDK requirements have been raised to iOS 15.1 and Android SDK 24 (Android 7). Time to upgrade and check it out!
segments.sourceMdx: React Native 0.76 is out with major updates\! The New Architecture is now enabled by default, there's a new React Native DevTools for improved debugging, and CSS support for `boxShadow` and `filter` for enhanced UI effects (available only with the new architecture). Be aware of some breaking changes: minimum SDK requirements have been raised to iOS 15.1 and Android SDK 24 (Android 7). Time to upgrade and check it out\!
segments.translated_content: React Native 0.76重磅发布！新架构现已默认启用，全新的React Native DevTools带来更强大的调试能力，并支持CSS的`boxShadow`和`filter`属性以实现更丰富的UI效果（仅限新架构）。请注意以下破坏性变更：最低SDK要求已提升至iOS 15.1和Android SDK 24（Android 7）。是时候升级体验了！

segments.content: v0.76 is cool, but what’s even better is that the [New Architecture is here](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2024/10/23/the-new-architecture-is-here) and officially declared ready to be used in production! This is a multi-year effort and a huge milestone for the React Native ecosystem! At this point, you probably already heard about JSI, Fabric, Turbomodules, synchronous low-overhead bridgeless communication, interop mode, and more. It’s not just about performance, but also solving important UX/DX problems such as being able to measure views synchronously to position a tooltip, or having `useLayoutEffect` work like on the web. What excites me most is also probably the most underrated: React Native can finally use React 18+ concurrent features, notably transitions, Suspense, and what’s coming next.

At this point, you probably already heard about JSI, Fabric, Turbomodules, synchronous low-overhead bridgeless communication, interop mode, and more. It’s not just about performance, but also solving important UX/DX problems such as being able to measure views synchronously to position a tooltip, or having `useLayoutEffect` work like on the web. What excites me most is also probably the most underrated: React Native can finally use React 18+ concurrent features, notably transitions, Suspense, and what’s coming next.
segments.translated_content: v0.76固然精彩，但更激动人心的是[新架构已正式宣告](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2024/10/23/the-new-architecture-is-here)具备生产环境使用条件！这是React Native生态历经多年努力的重大里程碑。您可能已了解JSI、Fabric、Turbomodules、同步低开销的无桥通信、互操作模式等特性——这不仅关乎性能提升，更解决了诸如同步测量视图定位工具提示、使`useLayoutEffect`实现与网页端一致行为等重要UX/DX问题。最令我振奋的或许是这个最被低估的特性：React Native终于能够完整支持React 18+的并发特性，包括过渡更新、Suspense以及未来更多可能性。

- 📜 [React Native 与 "原生体验"](https://mozzius.dev/post/3l777nhz4h32w): Bluesky 开发者详解如何让他们的 Expo 应用具备原生质感。这是诸多细节的累积成果，如 hairlineWidth、底部表单、动画效果和导航交互。
- 📜 [使用 React Native Skia 实现螺旋动画](https://reactiive.io/articles/animated-spiral): Reactiive 博客改版上线，新增了极具互动性的 Skia 动画沙盒，视觉效果令人惊艳！
- 📜 [通过真实用户监控(RUM)提升应用性能与业务增长](https://www.callstack.com/blog/enhance-app-performance-and-business-with-real-user-monitoring-rum)
- 📜 [利用 Expo 和 libSQL 优化首次加载体验](https://www.expostarter.com/blog/expo-libsql-improve-app-performance)
- 📜 [我们为何分叉 Flutter](https://flutterfoundation.dev/blog/posts/we-are-forking-flutter-this-is-why/)
- 📦 [Expo SDK 52 测试版](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/10-24-sdk-52-beta): 重大更新包含新架构、DOM 组件、Expo Router 4、服务端组件预览...我们将在稳定版发布后详细解读！
- 📦 [NativeWind 4.1](https://www.nativewind.dev/v4-1-announcement): v4 版本已作为最新稳定版发布至 npm，生产环境就绪！
- 📦 [Jetpack Compose React Native](https://github.com/andrew-levy/jetpack-compose-react-native/): Andrew 继 SwiftUI 绑定后，现正开发 Jetpack Compose 适配库。这些优秀工具能帮助原生开发者加入我们的社区！
- 📦 [React Native 底部标签栏 0.1 + 0.2](https://github.com/okwasniewski/react-native-bottom-tabs/releases): 默认启用新架构，新增 Apple TV 支持、长按操作和 Expo 配置插件
- 📦 [React Native visionOS 0.76](https://github.com/callstack/react-native-visionos/releases/tag/v0.76.0-visionos): 默认新架构，支持调试器
- 📦 [React Native TV 版 0.76](https://github.com/react-native-tvos/react-native-tvos/releases/tag/v0.76.0-0): 默认新架构，支持 NativeWind
- 📦 [React Native 测试库 12.8](https://github.com/callstack/react-native-testing-library/releases/tag/v12.8.0): 新增选项启用新架构并发渲染
- 📦 [Reassure 1.3](https://github.com/callstack/reassure/releases/tag/reassure%401.3.0): 提升 `measureRenders` 测量精度
- 📦 [React Native 0.76.1](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.76.1): 错误修复
- 📦 [Radon IDE 0.0.21 测试版](https://github.com/software-mansion/radon-ide/releases/tag/v0.0.21-beta)

- 🎥 [Catalin Miron - 使用 Reanimated 实现分页指示器](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m8ATJwrAif0)
